description: DiceSpec is a service that collects little tools for TRPG.

1.title: Dice Expecter
1.description: Calculate the expected value of the dice, etc. You can predict what kind of result you will get when you roll the dice.

2.title: Dice Roll
2.description: You can roll any dice you like, and because it uses BCDice, it is as comfortable to use as a session tool such as CCFOLIA.

3.title: Log Analysis
3.description: Analyze Cocoforia's logs to calculate dice averages, etc. If you are thinking "I think I had bad luck with dice this session, but what really happened?", try it out for yourself!

1.title: Totally free
1.description: There is no charge for using DiceSpec.

2.title: Nimble operation
2.description: DiceSpec is designed with performance in mind, with little time spent waiting for processing.

3.title: Open source
3.description: DiceSpec is entirely developed as open source, and anyone is free to view and propose modifications. So users can use it with peace of mind.
